Articles.Content:
Hello, I really want Squad to once again do open beta testing instead of closed testing. Firstly, this could GREATLY reduce the amount of spam threads about the update, clearing up the forums and preventing the svers from crashing. This could also lead to the discovery of more bugs, quirks, and more suggestions toward an update.

I highly support this as I think it is much more ffective than closed testing to a small group of people.
You cant really do Beta Testing in the Alpha Stage of the game...
Squad is, what you're getting access to is super buggy tests, and final runs.. All artists like to hide there mistakes

Oh dear gods no, never ever again, not in a million years, not after the last time

We do have the public bug tracker, and it is looked at by the devs, so please continue to use that
